    index="sales",
    size=0,
    aggs={
        "by_date": {
            "date_histogram": {
                "field": "date",
                "calendar_interval": "month"
            },
            "aggs": {
                "avg_number_of_sales_per_year": {
                    "rate": {
                        "field": "price",
                        "unit": "year",
                        "mode": "value_count"
                    }
                }
